attributes.action: The Ministry Of Defence Should Release All Classified Documents On UFO’s
attributes.background: There is no excuse for this information to be held from the public and if there is a reason then why can’t the public know.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Most Ministry of Defence documents relating to UFOs have been released to the National Archives:

http://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/ufos/

You could start a petition calling on the Government to change the rules about the release of classified documents if that's something you would like to see happen.
